Package nl.han.ica.yaeger.engine.entities.entity

Interface Entity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bounded, Initializable, NodeProvider, Removeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpriteEntity, TextEntity, UpdatableSpriteEntity
    public interface Entity
extends Initializable, Bounded, Removeable, NodeProvider
    An Entity will serve as the Root Interface for all objects that are part of a Yaeger game.

    • Method Summary
